0.text: The guild has been doing work to repair the caves. Not sure if they are going about resoration the right way though.

opts.text: Repairs? Like they are restoring the walls?
What do you mean the right way?

1.text: Ya, they've been doing repairs on the cave walls. You can see the construction sites her and there.

opts.text: Oh, I've seen those. Wasn't sure what they were doing,
Ya, I've seen those around. What do you mean the right way?

2.text: Oh you know, nevermind. We're not really supposed to talk about these things really.

3.text: Ya, they've been doing them for a while. Not sure what they're plan is.
